title: Load Product Grid with Bilingual Data
description: Verify that the product grid fetches and displays products from Supabase with correct bilingual content, images, categories, and AI Verdict badges.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage with product grid.
Check that products are fetched from Supabase without errors.
Verify product cards display images, titles in correct language, categories, ratings, and AI Verdict badges where applicable.
Ensure product cards are interactive and rendered responsively on different screen sizes.

title: Language Toggle Functionality and Layout Direction
description: Verify that toggling language switches all visible text between English and Arabic and adjusts layout direction (LTR/RTL) seamlessly.

steps.description: Load homepage initially in English.
Confirm page text and UI elements display in English with LTR layout.
Click the language toggle button in the navbar.
Verify that all text including Hero tagline, product titles, summaries, and navigation switches to Arabic.
Verify layout changes to Right-to-Left (RTL) direction correctly.
Toggle back to English.
Verify all content reverts back to English with LTR layout.

title: Hero Section Bilingual Rendering and Style Verification
description: Ensure the Hero Section displays the tagline 'Stop Searching. Let AI Decide.' correctly in English and Arabic with intended high-tech styling and subtle glowing effects.

steps.description: Load homepage in English.
Verify Hero tagline text is shown in English and styled according to UI specifications with glowing effects.
Switch language to Arabic.
Verify Hero tagline text is shown in Arabic with same styling and proper RTL alignment.

title: AI Verdict Badge Display on Product Cards
description: Verify that AI Verdict badges appear correctly on product cards when applicable, showing either 'AI Recommended' badge or a matching percentage like '98% Match'.

steps.description: Load product grid containing products with and without AI Verdict badges.
Confirm product cards with AI recommendations display the 'AI Recommended' badge.
Confirm products with match scores show correct percentage badges such as '98% Match'.
Ensure badges are bilingual and respond to language toggle.

title: Buy Now Button Opens Amazon Affiliate Link in New Tab
description: Test that clicking the 'Buy Now' button on a product card opens the correct Amazon affiliate link in a new browser tab without errors or navigation issues.

steps.description: Locate a product card with 'Buy Now' button.
Click the 'Buy Now' button.
Verify a new browser tab opens.
Check the URL in the new tab matches the product's Amazon affiliate URL.
Ensure original page remains unchanged and no errors occur.

title: SEO Best Practices and Metadata Validation
description: Validate that pages include proper meta tags, JSON-LD structured data, sitemaps, and multilingual SEO attributes for organic discoverability.

steps.description: Load homepage and several product detail pages.
Verify presence of correct meta tags including title, description, canonical URLs, and hreflang tags for both English and Arabic.
Check JSON-LD schema data is present and valid according to Google Structured Data Testing Tool.
Verify sitemap.xml is generated and accessible including URLs for both language versions.

title: Supabase Backend Connectivity and Data Fetching
description: Ensure the Supabase client helper connects successfully and fetches bilingual product data without crashes or latency issues.

steps.description: Trigger data fetch for products via Supabase client.
Confirm connection to Supabase established without error.
Verify returned data includes bilingual fields, images, affiliate links, AI verdict info.
Check data fetching performance meets acceptable response times.

title: Navbar and Core Components Render Correctly with Props
description: Verify that Navbar, Hero, and ProductCard components render correctly with the required props and provide expected interactive functionality.

steps.description: Render Navbar, Hero, and ProductCard components with sample data.
Check that Navbar displays language toggle button and navigation links properly.
Ensure Hero displays tagline and styling as expected.
Verify ProductCard shows images, bilingual title, AI summary, categories, ratings, and Buy Now button.
Interact with Navbar language toggle and Buy Now button on ProductCard.
Confirm all interactive elements respond correctly.

title: next-intl Locale Switching and RTL/LTR Adjustments
description: Test that next-intl configuration properly handles seamless locale switching between English and Arabic including text translations and appropriate RTL/LTR layout changes.

steps.description: Navigate the website and switch language via next-intl locale toggle.
Verify all translatable text updates correctly in real-time without page reload.
Verify layout direction changes smoothly between LTR for English and RTL for Arabic.
Confirm no UI breakage or misalignment during toggling.

title: Error Handling on Product Data Fetch Failure
description: Verify the system handles failures when fetching product data from Supabase gracefully, displaying user-friendly error messages without crashing.

steps.description: Simulate Supabase data fetch failure (e.g., network error or invalid response).
Confirm error is caught and no unhandled exceptions occur.
Verify user interface displays a clear, friendly error message or fallback UI.
Ensure the rest of the page remains functional without crashes.

title: Responsive Behavior of Product Grid and Cards
description: Confirm product grid and product cards adapt layouts appropriately on various screen sizes and device types including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open product grid page on desktop screen.
Verify grid layout shows appropriate number of columns and card sizes.
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile widths.
Confirm product cards reflow into fewer columns or single column with readable text and images.
Check UI elements remain accessible and visually consistent.

title: Affiliate Links Security and New Tab Behavior
description: Ensure that all affiliate links opened via Buy Now buttons meet security best practices, open in new tabs, and have appropriate rel attributes (noopener noreferrer).

steps.description: Click 'Buy Now' button on a product card.
Confirm new tab opens.
Inspect link's target attribute is '_blank'.
Verify anchor tag has rel='noopener noreferrer' attribute for security.
